pkgmetadata.longdescription: Swiss Solvency Test (SST) Standard Models // Framework for the implementation of solvency related computations based on standard models for the Swiss Solvency Test (SST), a risk-based capital standard for Swiss insurance companies. Allows Monte Carlo simulation of market risk, some insurance risks and their aggregation. Additional toolbox for preprocessing computations. Convenient 'shiny' GUI combined with a parser for an input 'excel' (.xlsx) template to simplify model configuration, data fill-in and results visualization.
